org.jruby.util.io

Class ChannelStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jruby.util.io.ChannelStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Finalizable, Stream

    public class ChannelStream
extends Object
implements Stream, Finalizable
    This file implements a seekable IO file.

    • Field Detail

      • BUFSIZE

        public static final int BUFSIZE
        The size of the read/write buffer allocated for this stream. This size has been scaled back from its original 16k because although the larger buffer size results in raw File.open times being rather slow (due to the cost of instantiating a relatively large buffer). We should try to find a happy medium, or potentially pool buffers, or perhaps even choose a value based on platform(??), but for now I am reducing it along with changes for the "large read" patch from JRUBY-2657.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • waitUntilReady

        public void waitUntilReady()
                    throws IOException,
                           InterruptedException
        Implement IO#wait as per io/wait in MRI. waits until input available or timed out and returns self, or nil when EOF reached. The default implementation loops while ready returns 0.
        Specified by:
        waitUntilReady in interface Stream
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • getline

        public int getline(org.jruby.util.ByteList dst,
          byte terminator)
            throws IOException,
                   BadDescriptorException
        Description copied from interface: Stream
        Read all bytes up to and including a terminator byte.

        If the terminator byte is found, it will be the last byte in the output buffer.

        Specified by:
        getline in interface Stream
        Parameters:
        dst - The output buffer.
        terminator - The byte to terminate reading.
        Returns:
        The number of bytes read, or -1 if EOF is reached.
        Throws:
        IOException
        BadDescriptorException

      • getline

        public int getline(org.jruby.util.ByteList dst,
          byte terminator,
          long limit)
            throws IOException,
                   BadDescriptorException
        Description copied from interface: Stream
        Reads all bytes up to and including a terminator byte or until limit is reached.

        If the terminator byte is found, it will be the last byte in the output buffer.

        Specified by:
        getline in interface Stream
        Parameters:
        dst - The output buffer.
        terminator - The byte to terminate reading.
        limit - the number of bytes to read unless EOF or terminator is found
        Returns:
        The number of bytes read, or -1 if EOF is reached.
        Throws:
        IOException
        BadDescriptorException

      • readall

        @Deprecated
public org.jruby.util.ByteList readall()
                                throws IOException,
                                       BadDescriptorException
        Deprecated. readall do busy loop for the IO which has NONBLOCK bit. You should implement the logic by yourself with fread().
        Specified by:
        readall in interface Stream
        Throws:
        IOException
        BadDescriptorException

      • lseek

        public void lseek(long offset,
         int type)
           throws IOException,
                  InvalidValueException,
                  PipeException,
                  BadDescriptorException
        Implementation of libc "lseek", which seeks on seekable streams, raises EPIPE if the fd is assocated with a pipe, socket, or FIFO, and doesn't do anything for other cases (like stdio).
        Specified by:
        lseek in interface Stream
        Throws:
        IOException
        InvalidValueException
        PipeException
        BadDescriptorException
